column4: Does anyone know a known-working virtual PC, VMware, etc. piece of software that I can run Ubuntu in a virtual environment?  Microsoft Virtual Server doesn't seem to work :/
we run over 30 virtual machines off a quad cpu opteron box.  Dapper as host OS, and Ubuntu as most of the guest OS'.
only real issue is that guest OS clocks run a bit slowly, but a cronjob to sync them frequently (*/5) fixes that.
